XinZhao.name: ºXin Zhaoº
XinZhao.title: ºøthe Seneschal of Demaciaºøº
XinZhao.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºWhenever Jarvan III, the king of Demacia, delivers one of his rallying speeches from the glinting marble balcony atop the Royal Palace, Xin Zhao is at his side. Coined the Seneschal of Demacia, Xin Zhao is the personal steward of the Lightshield Dynasty. His enigmatic, silent vigil has led to an abundance of conjecture concerning his ''secret life'' and origins. Whether it's ''Zaun double-agent'' tendered at the dinner table or ''indebted rune mage'' mused in the editorials of the ''Demacian Constant'', Xin Zhao betrays no hints to sate the curiosity of the masses... for good reason.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPrior to the formation of the League, Noxus was renowned for a spectacle called The Fleshing. It was a gladiatorial event with a cruel twist: as a fighter won matches, his number of opponents (generally prisoners of war) fought simultaneously would increase. This meant eventual death for every contender, but with unparalleled glory. Xin Zhao, known then as Viscero, was slated to face 300 soldiers, nearly six times the previous record. This was clearly meant to be his final match. Jarvan II, hearing of this unprecedented feat, infiltrated the arena to offer him an alternative: serve Demacia and punish those who ultimately sentence him to death in exchange for his freedom. Xin Zhao accepted, astonished that a king would risk his own life on his behalf. Under the cover of a prearranged Demacian assault on Noxus, Jarvan liberated Xin Zhao and his 300 opponents. During their retreat, Xin Zhao took a poisoned dart meant for Jarvan. This act of loyalty, from a man who vowed no allegiance, earned Xin Zhao a spot at his side until the day the king died. Now in the service of his son, Jarvan III, Xin Zhao is stepping into a new ring - the Fields of Justice - to fight for his adopted country and to honor the legacy of the man who gave purpose to his life.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøº''Death is inevitable, one can only avoid defeat.''ºøºøº
ºøº - Demacian Manual of Armsºøº
XinZhao.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºWhenever Jarvan III, the king of Demacia, delivers one of his rallying speeches from the glinting marble balcony atop the Royal Palace, Xin Zhao is at his side. Coined the Seneschal of Demacia,...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøXin Zhao is a great initiator to combat. Lead the front to start a fight and use your ultimate to do the most damage possible.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºIt's often worth getting at least 1 point of Battle Cry to gain the health restore effect.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºTry to position yourself so your ultimate's knockback is most effectiveºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøXin Zhao is a powerful initiator with both his charge and ultimate dealing damage to all units around him. Try having your team stay spread out until he's used his ultimate.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøXin Zhao relies heavily on his Three Talon Strikes for damage and cooldown resets, so preventing him from finishing his combo will have a dramatic effect.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøThree Talon Strikeøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøXin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøXin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøºøº bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºBattle Cryº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºXin Zhao passively heals every 3 attacks and can activate this ability to attack faster.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøXin Zhao heals himself for ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø every third basic attack.ºøº

ºActive: ººøºøºøXin Zhao unleashes a battle cry, increasing his Attack Speed by ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºøAudacious Chargeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøXin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøXin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals øºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% for 2 seconds. º

spells.name: ºøCrescent Sweepº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøXin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist based on number of champions hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºXin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ f1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø plus 15% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks enemies back. Xin Zhao gains ºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds for each champion hit.øºøºøº

ºChallenge:ººøºøºøºø If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.øºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºChallengeº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøXin Zhao challenges his target with his basic attacks and Audacious Charge, reducing its armor by 15% for 3 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøº
